_meanings:
{@--1@} To go or walk
round; {#taM hayaM tatra parigamya#} <ls>Rām.</ls>; {#yaTA#}
{#hi meruH sUryeRa nityaSaH parigamyate#} <ls>Mb.</ls>
{@--2@} To surround; <ls>Śi. 9. 26</ls>;  
<ls>Bk. 10. 1</ls>; {#senAparigata#} &c. 
{@--3@} To spread
everywhere, pervade all directions.
{@--4@} To attain to, obtain; {#vfzalatAM#} &c.
{@--5@} To know, understand, learn;  
<ls>R. 7. 71.</ls> 
{@--6@} To die, go forth (from this
world); {#vayaM yeByo jAtASciraparigatA#} 

{#eva Kalu te#} <ls>Bh. 3. 38.</ls> 
{@--7@} To 
overpower, affect; as in {#kzuDayA parigataH#}.
